title: Blender 3D Fundamentals
description: Get started with 3D modeling, animation, and rendering

challenges.title: Launch Blender and Navigate the Interface
challenges.description: Open Blender and learn the basic interface layout
challenges.instructions: Guide the user to open Blender and understand the main areas: 3D Viewport, Outliner, Properties, and Timeline. Explain the default cube, camera, and light.
hints: Launch Blender application
The default scene has a cube, camera, and light
Middle mouse button rotates the view
Scroll to zoom in and out

challenges.title: Master Navigation Controls
challenges.description: Learn to navigate the 3D viewport effectively
challenges.instructions: Teach the user viewport navigation: rotate (middle mouse), pan (Shift+middle mouse), zoom (scroll), and using the numpad for orthographic views.
hints: Middle mouse drag to rotate view
Shift + middle mouse to pan
Scroll wheel to zoom
Numpad 1, 3, 7 for front, right, top views

challenges.title: Select, Move, Rotate, Scale
challenges.instructions: Guide the user to select the default cube, then use G (move), R (rotate), and S (scale). Explain how to constrain to axes with X, Y, Z keys.
hints: Left-click to select objects
G to move (grab), then X/Y/Z to constrain axis
R to rotate, S to scale
Type numbers for precise transformations

challenges.title: Enter Edit Mode
challenges.description: Switch to Edit Mode and manipulate vertices, edges, faces
challenges.instructions: Show the user how to enter Edit Mode (Tab), select vertices/edges/faces, and make basic edits to the cube's geometry.
hints: Press Tab to toggle Edit Mode
1, 2, 3 keys switch between vertex, edge, face mode
Select individual vertices/edges/faces
Use G, R, S in Edit Mode too

challenges.title: Add and Delete Objects
challenges.description: Learn to add new primitives and delete objects
challenges.instructions: Guide the user to add new objects (Shift+A), choose different primitives, and delete objects (X or Delete key).
hints: Shift+A brings up the Add menu
Choose Mesh > primitives (sphere, cylinder, etc.)
X or Delete key to delete selected objects
Confirm deletion in the menu

challenges.title: Use Modifiers
challenges.instructions: Help the user add a Subdivision Surface modifier to make a cube smoother. Explain how modifiers work non-destructively.
hints: Select your object
Go to Modifiers panel (wrench icon)
Add Modifier > Subdivision Surface
Increase levels to see smoother geometry

challenges.title: Basic Materials and Colors
challenges.instructions: Guide the user to the Shading workspace or Material Properties, add a material, and change the base color.
hints: Go to Shading workspace at the top
Or use Material Properties panel
Click 'New' to add a material
Change Base Color to your preference

challenges.title: Render Your First Image
challenges.description: Set up the camera and render a still image
challenges.instructions: Show the user how to position the camera view (Numpad 0), adjust the camera, and render an image (F12).
hints: Press Numpad 0 to see camera view
Select camera and use G/R to position it
Press F12 to render
Wait for the render to complete

challenges.title: Save Your Project
challenges.instructions: Guide the user to save their work using File > Save or Ctrl+S. Explain .blend file format.
hints: File > Save (or Ctrl/Cmd+S)
Choose a location and filename
Blender files use .blend extension
Save often to prevent losing work
